test_cases.Title: random_numbers_selection_001_Screen1_Screen2_TEST_Mobile_initiating the random number selection process

Steps.Step Description: Open the application and navigate to the 'Inserisci 12 numeri' screen.

test_cases.Preconditions: The application is installed and the user is on the main screen.
test_cases.Expected Result: User is navigating to the number selection screen.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the initiation of random number selection.

test_cases.Title: confirm_selection_002_Screen2_Screen3_TEST_Mobile_confirming the selection of random numbers

Steps.Step Description: On the 'Scelgo 12 numeri' screen, tap the 'Casuali' button to confirm the selection.
Steps.Expected Result: User is taken to the 'Hai scelto 12 di 12 numeri' screen.

Steps.Step Description: Check the message displayed on the screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The message 'Hai scelto 12 di 12 numeri' is correctly displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is on the 'Scelgo 12 numeri' screen after initiating the random selection.
test_cases.Expected Result: Selection is confirmed and the appropriate message is displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the confirmation of random number selection only.

test_cases.Title: manual_and_random_selection_003_Screen4_Screen5_TEST_Mobile_selecting 5 manual and additional random numbers

Steps.Step Description: Open the application and navigate to the 'Inserisci 12 numeri' screen.
Enter 5 manual numbers in the input fields.
Steps.Expected Result: The entered numbers are accepted and displayed correctly.
Navigates to the 'Scelgo 12 numeri' screen with the first 5 numbers displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Tap the 'Casuali' button to select additional random numbers.
Steps.Expected Result: User is taken to the 'Hai scelto 12 di 12 numeri' screen.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is on the 'Inserisci 12 numeri' screen.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully enters 5 manual numbers and confirms random selection.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers manual input and subsequent random selections.

test_cases.Title: confirm_final_selection_004_Screen6_Screen4_TEST_Mobile_confirm the final number selection

Steps.Step Description: On the 'Hai scelto 12 di 12 numeri' screen, tap 'Conferma'.
Steps.Expected Result: User is navigated back to the 'Inserisci 12 numeri' screen.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the numbers are displayed in the input field.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected numbers are correctly displayed for user verification.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has previously confirmed the selection of numbers.
test_cases.Expected Result: Final selection is confirmed and displayed correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the confirmation of the final number selection.
